add(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint.details: This vault DOES NOT support deflationary tokens — it expects that  the amount of transferred tokens would equal the actually deposited  amount. In practice this means that this vault DOES NOT support USDT  and similar tokens (that do not provide these guarantees).

params.delegatee: The address to delegate votes to
The address to delegate votes to
params.expiry: The time at which to expire the signature
params.nonce: The contract state required to match the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature

params._amount: The amount to deposit to vault

params.account: The address to get votes balance

params.account: The address of the account to check

add(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint.notice: Add a new token pool. Can only be called by the admin.

executeWithdrawal(address,uint256).notice: Execute withdrawal to XVSVault for XVS allocation

getCurrentVotes(address).notice: Gets the current votes balance for `account`

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).notice: Determine the xvs stake balance for an account

requestWithdrawal(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Request withdrawal to XVSVault for XVS allocation
